goal:
The dataset is ['data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv'], which contains a series of filenames. 
Each file contains historical values for these features ('name', 'trade_date', 'pe', 'pb', 'total_mv') and potentially more information. 
Notice: The 'trade_date' field is in the format YYYYMMDD (e.g., 20240102), and should be converted to a datetime format.

For each file, extract the following time-related features:
- Year: Extract the year from the trade date.
- Month: Extract the month from the trade date.
- Day: Extract the day of the month from the trade date.

Plot the trend of relevant financial metrics (e.g. 'total_mv', or any other feature available in the file) over 'trade_date' for all files on the same graph.
The x-axis should represent 'trade_date', and the y-axis should represent the values of the selected metrics with unit '万元'
Please ensure that:
- The x-axis uses the datetime format.
- Each file's data is displayed on the same plot, with a different color or style to distinguish them.
- Include a legend with accurate labels corresponding to each file's name to make sure each file can be identified properly.
- Set font "SimHei". Do not use plt.rcParams to set fonts globally. Load the font file directly via FontProperties, with the font path as:font_path = "/Library/Fonts/SimHei.ttf".
- Use plt.subplots() to create a figure and axis object.

Save the plot under /Users/ash/Desktop/本科/毕业论文/writer/output/2025水产养殖行业研究报告/image, and the filename should include "东方财富概念版块". 
**Important Notes:**
Use fig.savefig() to save the figure.

tasks.instruction: Load the dataset 'data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv' and read it into a pandas DataFrame.
tasks.code:
import pandas as pd

# Load the dataset
data_path = 'data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Ensure the 'trade_date' column is in datetime format
df['trade_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['trade_date'], format='%Y%m%d')

# Extract year, month, and day from the trade date
df['Year'] = df['trade_date'].dt.year
df['Month'] = df['trade_date'].dt.month
df['Day'] = df['trade_date'].dt.day

# Ensure the processed data is still in the same DataFrame
df_processed = df.copy()

tasks.instruction: Convert the 'trade_date' column from string to datetime format.
tasks.code: # This text describes the columns of the dataset.

tasks.instruction: Extract the year, month, and day from the 'trade_date' column and create new columns for them.
Plot the trend of 'total_mv' over 'trade_date' for all files on the same graph.
tasks.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.font_manager import FontProperties

# Load the font file
font_path = "/Library/Fonts/SimHei.ttf"
font = FontProperties(fname=font_path)

# Define the data path
data_path = 'data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv'

# Read the data
df = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Convert trade_date to datetime
df['trade_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['trade_date'], format='%Y%m%d')

# Extract year, month, and day from trade_date
df['Year'] = df['trade_date'].dt.year
df['Month'] = df['trade_date'].dt.month
df['Day'] = df['trade_date'].dt.day

# Plot the trend of total_mv over trade_date for all files on the same graph
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))

for file in df['name'].unique():
    data = df[df['name'] == file]
    plt.plot(data['trade_date'], data['total_mv'], label=file)

plt.xlabel('Trade Date', fontproperties=font)
plt.ylabel('Total MV (万元)', fontproperties=font)
plt.title('水产养殖行业研究报告', fontproperties=font, fontsize=16)
plt.legend(prop=font)
plt.grid(True)

# Save the plot
output_path = '/Users/ash/Desktop/本科/毕业论文/writer/output/2025水产养殖行业研究报告/image'
fig_name = '东方财富概念版块_水产养殖行业研究报告.png'
plt.savefig(output_path + '/' + fig_name)

plt.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.font_manager import FontProperties

# Define the font path
font_path = "/Library/Fonts/SimHei.ttf"
font = FontProperties(fname=font_path)

# Define the data path and output path
data_path = 'data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv'
output_path = '/Users/ash/Desktop/本科/毕业论文/writer/output/2025水产养殖行业研究报告/image'

# Read the data
df = pd.read_csv(data_path)
df['trade_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['trade_date'], format='%Y%m%d')

# Extract time-related features
df['Year'] = df['trade_date'].dt.year
df['Month'] = df['trade_date'].dt.month
df['Day'] = df['trade_date'].dt.day

# Plot the trend of relevant financial metrics
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
for file in df['name'].unique():
    data = df[df['name'] == file]
    plt.plot(data['trade_date'], data['total_mv'], label=file)

# Set the axis labels and title
plt.xlabel('Trade Date', fontproperties=font)
plt.ylabel('Total MV (万元)', fontproperties=font)
plt.title('水产养殖行业研究报告', fontproperties=font, fontsize=16)

# Add legend
plt.legend(prop=font)
plt.grid(True)

# Save the plot
fig_name = '东方财富概念版块_水产养殖行业研究报告.png'
plt.savefig(output_path + '/' + fig_name)

# Show the plot
plt.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.font_manager import FontProperties

# Load the font file
font_path = "/Library/Fonts/SimHei.ttf"
font = FontProperties(fname=font_path)

# Define the data path
data_path = 'data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv'

# Read the data
df = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Convert trade_date to datetime
df['trade_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['trade_date'], format='%Y%m%d')

# Extract year, month, and day from trade_date
df['Year'] = df['trade_date'].dt.year
df['Month'] = df['trade_date'].dt.month
df['Day'] = df['trade_date'].dt.day

# Plot the trend of total_mv over trade_date for all files on the same graph
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))

for file in df['name'].unique():
    data = df[df['name'] == file]
    plt.plot(data['trade_date'], data['total_mv'], label=file)

plt.xlabel('Trade Date', fontproperties=font)
plt.ylabel('Total MV (万元)', fontproperties=font)
plt.title('水产养殖行业研究报告', fontproperties=font, fontsize=16)
plt.legend(prop=font)
plt.grid(True)

# Save the plot
output_path = '/Users/ash/Desktop/本科/毕业论文/writer/output/2025水产养殖行业研究报告/image'
fig_name = '东方财富概念版块_水产养殖行业研究报告.png'

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.font_manager import FontProperties

# Define the font path
font_path = "/Library/Fonts/SimHei.ttf"
font = FontProperties(fname=font_path)

# Define the data path and output path
data_path = 'data/东方财富概念版块/水产养殖.csv'
output_path = '/Users/ash/Desktop/本科/毕业论文/writer/output/2025水产养殖行业研究报告/image'

# Read the data
df = pd.read_csv(data_path)
df['trade_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['trade_date'], format='%Y%m%d')

# Extract time-related features
df['Year'] = df['trade_date'].dt.year
df['Month'] = df['trade_date'].dt.month
df['Day'] = df['trade_date'].dt.day

# Plot the trend of relevant financial metrics
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
for file in df['name'].unique():
    data = df[df['name'] == file]
    plt.plot(data['trade_date'], data['total_mv'], label=file)

# Set the axis labels and title
plt.xlabel('Trade Date', fontproperties=font)
plt.ylabel('Total MV (万元)', fontproperties=font)
plt.title('水产养殖行业研究报告', fontproperties=font, fontsize=16)

# Add legend
plt.legend(prop=font)
plt.grid(True)

# Save the plot
fig_name = '东方财富概念版块_水产养殖行业研究报告.png'
plt.savefig(output_path + '/' + fig_name)

# Show the plot
plt.show()
